channel.title: TEGcasts
channel.link:
https://radar.brookes.ac.uk/ en-gb © 2018 Digital Services, Oxford Brookes University The Technology Experimentation Group podcast Digital Services Digital Services make a podcast. The official podcast of the Digital Services team at Oxford Brookes University. Recorded by Richard Francis and Harry Kalantzis.
Digital Services digitalservices@brookes.ac.uk
no
TEGcast Episode 1: the one in which Richard and Harry discover Zencastr. Richard and Harry discover Zencastr. Harry tells me we need “show notes” to accompany the audio. So here they are. In this our first episode Harry and I discover and try out Zencastr, a platform for recording high quality audio interviews on VoIP. As you’ll hear, you can also take your guest by surprise by adding sound effects, as Harry does to me! http://techexperiments.brookesblogs.net/2018/02/06/tegcast-episode-1-discovering-zencastr/
Tue, 6 Feb 2018 10:01:07 +0000 Digital Services 00:01:28 false http://techexperiments.brookesblogs.net/2018/02/06/tegcast-episode-1-discovering-zencastr/
TEGcast Episode 2: the one in which Harry saves Richard from digital demise. Harry saves Richard from digital demise. In this episode, Richard has been replaced by a digital assistant. His battery runs dangerously low and Harry has to come to the rescue. Exciting times indeed. http://techexperiments.brookesblogs.net/2018/03/05/the-one-in-which-harry-saves-richard-from-digital-demise/
Mon, 5 Mar 2018 10:01:07 +0000 Digital Services 00:01:28 false http://techexperiments.brookesblogs.net/2018/03/05/the-one-in-which-harry-saves-richard-from-digital-demise/
TEGcast Episode 3: the one in which Harry and Richard float off into outer space. ”I’m sorry Larry. I’m afraid I can’t do that.” This episode is subtitled: ‘”I’m sorry Larry. I’m afraid I can’t do that.” Just another everyday altercation with the IT Service Desk.’ And comes with apologies to Stanley Kubrick. http://techexperiments.brookesblogs.net/2018/03/15/tegcast-episode-3-the-one-in-which-harry-and-richard-float-off-into-outer-space/
Thu, 15 Mar 2018 10:01:07 +0000 Digital Services 00:01:28 false http://techexperiments.brookesblogs.net/2018/03/15/tegcast-episode-3-the-one-in-which-harry-and-richard-float-off-into-outer-space/
TEGcast Episode 4: the one in which Harry’s workout gets interrupted. Harry’s workout gets interrupted. Harry is doing his daily routine workout until he gets interrupted by Feedback Studio. http://techexperiments.brookesblogs.net/2018/05/14/tegcast-episode-4-the-one-in-which-harrys-workout-gets-interrupted/
Mon, 14 May 2018 10:01:07 +0000 Digital Services 00:01:28 false http://techexperiments.brookesblogs.net/2018/05/14/tegcast-episode-4-the-one-in-which-harrys-workout-gets-interrupted/
